serviceData.title: Comprehensive Roofing & Restoration Solutions in Central Indiana

We work with major insurance carriers, follow local code, and use industry-leading materials to ensure long-lasting results.

lists.title: Residential Asphalt Shingle Roofing
lists.shortDescription: Full asphalt shingle roof replacements and new roof installations using architectural and designer shingles for long-lasting curb appeal.
lists.description:
• Service Scope: Full roof replacement, tear-off, underlayment, flashing, ventilation, new shingles

  • Benefits:

    • High-quality dimensional and architectural shingle options

    • Improved curb appeal and increased property value

    • Industry-standard warranty options and workmanship guarantee
lists.h2: What Is Residential Asphalt Shingle Roofing in Central Indiana
lists.p2: A residential asphalt shingle roof replacement involves removing existing roofing materials down to the deck (when necessary), installing proper underlayment and ice & water shield, and finishing with new shingles, flashing, and ridge ventilation. Our crews use code-compliant methods and premium materials to protect your home from the elements. Contact us at [phone] to schedule a roof inspection and free replacement estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Residential Roof Replacement in Central Indiana?
lists.overViewHeading: Overview Of Residential Asphalt Shingle Roofing
lists.overViewContent:
What's Included:

  • Full tear-off or overlay (as needed) and professional installation

  • Ice & water shield at eaves and penetrations

  • Complete flashing replacement and ridge/soffit ventilation upgrades

  • Job-site cleanup and disposal of old materials

Typical Project Duration:
1–3 days for most single-family homes (weather dependent)
Materials: Architectural asphalt shingles, synthetic underlayment, metal flashing, ridge vents

leftSection.title: Shingle Options & Upgrades
leftSection.description: We install architectural, premium designer, and impact-resistant shingles, plus options for upgraded underlayment, enhanced ventilation, and metal drip edge.

rightSection.title: How to Choose the Right Roofing System
rightSection.description: Consider warranty length, wind and impact resistance, color and style, and attic ventilation. We provide samples and a detailed estimate to help you decide.

lists.comapreHeading: What Is Included in a Residential Roof Replacement?
allowedItems: Removal and disposal of old roofing (tear-off) or overlay options
New synthetic underlayment and ice & water shield
Starter strips, shingles, ridge caps, and flashing
Ventilation solutions and drip edge installation
Full cleanup, magnet sweep, and landfill disposal
prohibitedItems: Asbestos abatement or hazardous material removal (handled by specialists)
Major structural decking replacement (requires separate quote)
Interior repairs for water-damaged ceilings or insulation (unless contracted)
Tree removal or large limb trimming
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Residential Asphalt Shingle Roofing:
idealProjects: Full roof replacements on single-family homes
Aging roofs with widespread shingle failure
Houses with storm or hail damage
Homeowners looking to improve curb appeal and resale value
Upgrading to impact-resistant or designer shingles

lists.p3: 24/7 emergency response | Certified leak detection and repair technicians | Insurance claim support and photos for adjusters | Competitive, transparent pricing | Local crews trained in storm restoration
lists.seoContent:
Trusted Roof Repair & Leak Restoration in Central Indiana

Has your roof sprung a leak or suffered storm damage? Our repair specialists in Central Indiana provide fast, reliable repairs and full documentation for insurance. Call Us at [phone] for emergency tarping, leak tracing, and permanent restoration solutions.
lists.overViewHeading: Overview Of Roof Repair & Leak Restoration
lists.overViewContent:
• Limitations & What Requires Separate Evaluation:

    • Widespread structural rot or decking failure may require a replacement estimate

    • Mold remediation or interior drywall replacement is quoted separately

    • Asbestos-containing materials require certified abatement contractors

Typical Repair Services Included:

  • Leak source identification and waterproofing

  • Replacement of damaged shingles, flashing, and pipe collars

  • Temporary tarping and emergency stabilization

Response Time:
Same day emergency response when available; standard repairs scheduled within 1–5 business days

leftSection.title: Emergency Tarping & Stabilization
leftSection.description: Board-up and tarping to prevent further water intrusion after storms until permanent repairs are completed.

rightSection.title: Insurance & Documentation Help
rightSection.description: We provide photo documentation, repair estimates, and work directly with your adjuster to streamline claims for covered damage.

allowedItems: Flashing repair around chimneys and vents
Emergency tarping and temporary leak mitigation
prohibitedItems: Extensive structural deck replacement without prior assessment
Interior mold remediation and large-scale water restoration
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Roof Repair & Leak Restoration:
idealProjects: Active roof leaks and drip locations
Small sections of missing shingles after high winds
Immediate temporary protection after roof blow-off

lists.p3: Warehouses and distribution centers | Retail and strip malls | Apartment complexes and condominiums | Light industrial facilities | Municipal and institutional buildings
lists.seoContent:
Commercial Flat Roofing & TPO Services in Central Indiana

Central Indiana Roofing & Restoration offers professional commercial roofing services including TPO and EPDM installations, system recoveries, and maintenance programs. We work with building owners and property managers to extend roof life and reduce operating costs. Call [phone] to schedule a commercial roof assessment.
lists.overViewHeading: Overview Of Commercial Flat & TPO Roofing
lists.overViewContent:
What's Included in a Commercial Roofing Project:

  • Roof membrane installation or full system replacement

  • Insulation upgrades and tapered insulation for drainage

  • Flashing, curb, and penetration detailing

  • Project management, safety compliance, and final inspection

Typical Project Timeline:
Dependent on building size — from several days for small retail to multiple weeks for large industrial facilities

leftSection.title: Maintenance & Extended Service
leftSection.description: We offer roof maintenance plans, preventive inspections, and scheduled repairs to extend the life of commercial roof systems and prevent costly leaks.

rightSection.title: Selecting the Right Commercial System
rightSection.description: Our team evaluates building usage, insulation needs, energy goals, and budget to recommend TPO, EPDM, PVC, or modified bitumen solutions with appropriate warranties.
